SEARCH
Package gui

Class SupplyConfigurationController

java.lang.Object
gui.SupplyConfigurationController
public class SupplyConfigurationController extends Object
Controller class for handling the supply configuration view in the GUI. This class manages the user interface components related to setting up the delivery or pickup options, as well as processing the order.
Version:
August 2024
Author:
Kfir Amoyal, Noam Furman, Israel Ohayon, Eitan Zerbel, Yaniv Shatil, Omri Heit
